comments: Reference does not include the floor function.
references: D. M. Burton, Elementary Number Theory, Allyn and Bacon Inc. Boston MA, 1976, Prob. 7-4 3, p. 152.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
prog: (PARI) a(n)=floor(n/eulerphi(n)); vector(250,n,a(n))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 50); for (n=1, 2000, write("b062356.txt", n, " ", floor(n/eulerphi(n))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 07 2001
